attributes.action: Make the use of face masks in classrooms compulsory.
attributes.background: Educational settings are clearly super spreaders, so if teachers and students are asked to attend during the second lockdown, the use of facial protective covering should be made compulsory.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign one of these petitions:

Make wearing face masks mandatory in secondary schools and colleges.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227

Mandatory for children aged 11 and above to wear face masks whilst at school.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331826
